attributes.title: Hinduism Is a Greater Science That Makes You More Courageous And Involved With Life || 15 Nov 2020
attributes.description:
*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*GREATER SCIENCE OF PARAMASHIVA, LIFE, EXISTENCE, REALITY CAN BE REALIZED WITH THE GREATER ABILITY TO VISUALISE. PARAMASHIVA DHYANA - VISUALIZING PARAMASHIVA’S FORM WITH 25 HEADS, 50 HANDS, 75 EYES IS A POWERFUL METHOD TO EVOLVE GREATER VISUALIZATION POSSIBILITY IN YOU WHICH WILL MAKE YOU UNDERSTAND THE GREATER SCIENCE OF LIFE AND GREATER INVOLVEMENT WITH LIFE.

*WHEN YOU HAVE GREATER POSSIBILITY OF VISUALISATION, YOUR INVOLVEMENT WITH LIFE WILL BE MORE COURAGEOUS. YOU WILL TRUST YOURSELF, YOU WILL BELIEVE YOURSELF, YOU WILL HAVE SO MUCH STRENGTH, NOT FEARS. FEAR MAKES YOU A RELUCTANT BELOVED, RELUCTANT HUSBAND, RELUCTANT WIFE, RELUCTANT BUSINESSMAN, RELUCTANT WARRIOR, RELUCTANT TEACHER.

*A LOWER ABILITY OF VISUALISING INVOKES GREATER FEARS IN YOU. DUE TO YOUR LOWER VISUALIZATION LEVEL, MORE FEARS, MORE UNKNOWN. BECAUSE THERE IS MORE UNKNOWN, MORE FEARS, LESS INVOLVEMENT YOU BECOME RELUCTANTLY INVOLVED IN EVERYTHING AND THAT CREATES MORE FEARS. IT BECOMES A VICIOUS CIRCLE.

* MORE FEARS - LESS INVOLVEMENT, LESS INVOLVEMENT - MORE RELUCTANCE, MORE RELUCTANCE - MORE FEARS AND MORE FEARS FEEDS INTO LESS INVOLVEMENT, LESS INVOLVEMENT THEN MORE RELUCTANCE, MORE RELUCTANCE MORE FEARS. MORE AND MORE OF THIS VICIOUS CIRCLE PUTS A MAN INTO DELUSION, BREAKS HIS BODY AND MIND - IT IS JUST DILUTED EXISTENCE.

*GREATER POSSIBILITY TO VISUALIZE CHANGES THE WHOLE GAME, THAT IS THE TIPPING POINT. WHEN YOU HAVE A GREATER POSSIBILITY OF VISUALISING, LESS FEARS, MORE INVOLVEMENT WHETHER IN YOUR BUSINESS, CAREER, HEALTH, RELATIONSHIP, POWER MANIFESTATION SCIENCE, ENLIGHTENMENT, IN EVERYTHING YOU DO, GREATER INVOLVEMENT MEANS GREATER REVELATIONS ABOUT THE GREATER SCIENCE OF LIFE.

*WHEN YOU UNDERSTAND THE GREATER SCIENCE OF LIFE, GREATER COURAGE, MORE POSSIBILITY, MORE FEARLESSNESS, MORE JOY, MORE BLISS, LESS SHIT.

*ONE OF THE GREATEST SUFFERING HINDUS WENT THROUGH, IS GOING THROUGH IS THEY HAVE BECOME RELUCTANT WARRIORS, NOT ONLY IN ANY WARS AGAINST HINDUISM, EVEN IN THE LIFE.

*BIGGEST CRIME DONE TO HINDUS IS THEIR SPIRITUAL SCIENCE, THE GREATER SCIENCE OF LIFE IS SEPARATED FROM HINDUISM AND LIFESTYLE OF HINDUS.

*WHEN THE ANTI-HINDUS, INVADERS ATTACKED HINDU NATIONS AND HINDUS, THE FIRST THING THEY DID WAS THEY SEPARATED THE GREATER SCIENCE, THE SPIRITUAL KNOWLEDGE OF HINDUISM FROM HINDUS. STUPID HINDUS STARTED DENYING THEIR OWN GREAT ANCESTRAL HERITAGE IN THE NAME OF MYTH, FALSE, LIES.

*ALL THESE CHEAP WORDS ATTRIBUTED TO THE HINDUISM GREATER SCIENCE WAS SWALLOWED BY HINDUS - THAT IS THE WORST THING.

*HINDUS ARE BRAIN WASHED AGAINST HINDUISM. PEOPLE TELL ME, “HOW DO YOU KNOW WE ARE BRAINWASHED?”

*THERE ARE PEOPLE, KINGS, AUTOCRATS WHO KILLED MORE NUMBER OF PEOPLE THAN ADOLF HILTER BUT YOU GUYS DON’T KNOW ABOUT THEM.

*MORE NUMBER OF HINDUS ARE KILLED BY MORE NUMBER OF KINGS AND AUTOCRATS, ANTI-HINDU DEMONIC RULERS THAN ADOLF HITLER BUT HISTORY DOESN'T TELL YOU ABOUT IT AND YOU STILL THINK YOU ARE NOT BRAINWASHED?

*I CAN GIVE YOU ENOUGH HISTORICAL EVIDENCE AND REFERENCES WHERE THE KINGS, AUTOCRATS, DEMONS, DEMONIC RULERS, I DON’T EVEN WANT TO CALL THEM KINGS, WHO KILLED MORE NUMBER OF HINDUS THAN THE NUMBER OF JEWS HITLER KILLED. BUT THIS IS NOT TAUGHT TO HINDUS NOR TOLD TO THE WORLD. AND STUPID HINDUS STILL THINK THEY ARE NOT BRAINWASHED.

*WHETHER IT IS KNOWING ABOUT THE HISTORY OF HINDUISM OR THE SPIRITUAL; KNOWLEDGE, THE GREATER SCIENCE OF HINDUISM, HINDUS HAVE BECOME RELUCTANT BREATHERS EVEN IN THEIR BREATHING, THEY BECAME RELUCTANT, HUSBAND, RELUCTANT WIFES, RELUCTANT IN FAMILY, IN BUSINESS, IN EVERYTHING.

*THE STAMINA OF THE CONSCIOUSNESS DRASTICALLY SHOOTS UP WITH YOUR ABILITY TO VISUALIZE.

*WHEN YOU TAKE UP A BUSINESS, IF YOU ARE ABLE TO VISUALIZE PARAMASHIVA WITH 25 HEADS, 50 HANDS, 75 EYES, IF YOUR INNER SPACE HAS THAT VISUALIZATION CAPACITY, YOU HAVE WILL DEEP VISUALIZATION, GREATER INVOLVEMENT, LESS FEAR, LESS UNKNOWN IN YOUR BUSINESS. IF YOU KNOW HOW MANY THINGS ARE UNKNOWN, THEY BECOME KNOWN TO YOU.

*WORK CONTINUOUSLY TO INCREASE YOUR ABILITY TO VISUALIZE - ONCE YOU START THAT LEADS TO MORE AND MORE INVOLVEMENT, YOU GET MORE AND MORE COURAGE, JOY, STRENGTH TO LIFE.
